page.title: 02Home Life
page.content: As unemployment is not a major factor the standard of living is good. Although many people are home owners there is also a small council estate.Pride is taken in both home and garden. Some homes are centrally heated, using oil, electricity or solid fuel; mains gas is not available. Most homes have television and demand for video recorders is increasing. Many houses have garage facilities and one or more cars. Kitchen equipment is sophisticated including microwave oven, mixer etc. For health reasons there is emphasis on high fibre/low fat diet, therefore local fruit and fresh vegetables are in demand. Many people keep dogs, cats or cagebirds as pets, and tinned pet food is available from shops.
